data.title: Group consonants and vowels
data.statement:
In the given string, you have to separate any vowel and a consonant with a space. Also, remove any number of space between two vowels or two consonants. There should not be more than one white space between two groups. 
Note: Only a,e,i,o and u and considered as vowels in this puzzle.

testCases.title: Validator 1
testCases.testOut: a m i p e k

testCases.title: Validator 2
testCases.testIn: zbo ijp k li ert y

testCases.title: Validator 3
testCases.testOut: h e h e l o l

testCases.title: More Spaces
testCases.testIn: a       e   ko     p   e   rk   l    puer     ki
testCases.testOut: ae k o p e rklp ue rk i

testCases.title: Validator 4
testCases.testIn: a a das das    a spd aww wa  d
testCases.testOut: aa d a sd a s a spd a www a d

data.inputDescription: First line: String to be processed [[statement]]
data.outputDescription: A String that has vowels not connected to consonants and no space between two adjacent vowels and adjacent consonants.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

In the given string, you have to separate any vowel and a consonant with a space. Also, remove any number of space between two vowels or two consonants. There should not be more than one white space between two groups.
Note: Only a,e,i,o and u and considered as vowels in this puzzle.
Input
First line: String to be processed statement
Output
A String that has vowels not connected to consonants and no space between two adjacent vowels and adjacent consonants.
Constraints
Example
Input
bc a e k l
Output
bc ae kl
